<Link id="l00009" /><CodeLine lineNumber="9"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This file provides a simple and efficient mechanism for performing general</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00010" /><CodeLine lineNumber="10"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// tree-based pattern matches on the VPlan values and recipes, based on</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00011" /><CodeLine lineNumber="11"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// LLVM&#39;s IR pattern matchers.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00012" /><CodeLine lineNumber="12"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00013" /><CodeLine lineNumber="13"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Currently it provides generic matchers for unary and binary VPInstructions,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00014" /><CodeLine lineNumber="14"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// and specialized matchers like m&#95;Not, m&#95;ActiveLaneMask, m&#95;BranchOnCond,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00015" /><CodeLine lineNumber="15"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// m&#95;BranchOnCount to match specific VPInstructions.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00016" /><CodeLine lineNumber="16"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// TODO: Add missing matchers for additional opcodes and recipes as needed.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00017" /><CodeLine lineNumber="17"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00018" /><CodeLine lineNumber="18"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//===----------------------------------------------------------------------===//</span></CodeLine>
